88d4d34a8064a4ff39fd5e144eea7762 (16:45): "The Contest is void in Cuba, Iran, Province of Quebec (Canada), North Korea, Sudan, Syria, Union of Myanmar, and where prohibited by law or restricted by law or regulations."
88d4d34a8064a4ff39fd5e144eea7762 (16:45): Are they making some kind of statement about Canadians there?
8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (16:45): "Entry must be compatible with and function properly in the then-current final product version of Firefox 4 and other modern web browsers without plug-ins"
8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (16:45): Says the real rules
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:45): Almost all competitions are illegal in Quebec
88d4d34a8064a4ff39fd5e144eea7762 (16:46): Really?  Even totally skill-based competitions?
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:46): Well illegal is wrong
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:46): b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea: are competitions illegal or does Quebec require drafting all rules in French or something?
88d4d34a8064a4ff39fd5e144eea7762 (16:46): also suspected it might be because it had to be in French :P
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:46): No, I think they have strong rules about lotteries or something
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:47): And so it is lots of effort to prove that your competition is not an illegal lottery
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:47): So instead you are just not allowed to enter
88d4d34a8064a4ff39fd5e144eea7762 (16:47): I thought Americans were the ones who were anti-lottery.
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:47): 88d4d34a8064a4ff39fd5e144eea7762: in Finland, holding a lottery requires a license

88d4d34a8064a4ff39fd5e144eea7762 (16:49): I remember reading about some guy who ran a British gambling site with lots of American customers, who was arrested when he visited America because his site didn't comply with American gambling laws.
88d4d34a8064a4ff39fd5e144eea7762 (16:49): (some British gambling sites started blocking America after that :P)
9dfea2f9bd9114520591dceb20d528a1 (16:50): Quebec probably also requires that everything (including prizes) be available in French too :P
88d4d34a8064a4ff39fd5e144eea7762 (16:51): The contest rules say submissions have to be in English.
88d4d34a8064a4ff39fd5e144eea7762 (16:51): I just think it's amusing that Quebec is on the same list as  Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Sudan, Syria, and Myanmar.
88d4d34a8064a4ff39fd5e144eea7762 (16:51): Most of those are under U.S. embargo, aren't they?  At least the first three.

88d4d34a8064a4ff39fd5e144eea7762 (16:52): The judges presumably had to judge everyone, not just the finalists, so that makes sense.
